definition: a fine grained mineral having a soft soapy feel and consisting of hydrated magnesium silicate, apply talcum powder to (one's body)
details:
noun
- a fine grained mineral having a soft soapy feel and consisting of hydrated magnesium silicate
= example: a fine grained mineral having a soft soapy feel and consisting of hydrated magnesium silicate
= synonyms: talcum
verb
- apply talcum powder to (one's body)
